name: Brandon Trumble
summary: Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience delivering high-performance enterprise applications primarily using C#/.NET Core, ASP.NET Core, and Microsoft technologies. Experienced in building scalable backend services, Python and Node.js microservices, React/TypeScript frontends, and cloud-native deployments (Azure/AWS). Skilled in AI/LLM integration, CI/CD, database design (SQL Server, PostgreSQL), and secure, data-driven solutions, leading cross-functional teams to deliver maintainable, user-centric platforms.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
bullets: Architected and delivered enterprise-grade backend systems using C#/.NET Core and ASP.NET Core, designing RESTful APIs, microservices, and background processing pipelines supporting production-scale workloads.
Developed modern frontend applications with React and TypeScript, applying clean component architectures, state management best practices, and seamless API integration.
Built and integrated Python-based microservices using FastAPI, Django, and Flask for data processing, AI workflows, and specialized services alongside .NET platforms.

Designed and optimized data access layers using Entity Framework Core and SQL Server, ensuring transactional consistency, efficient migrations, and high-performance queries; integrated PostgreSQL and MongoDB where appropriate.
Implemented secure authentication and authorization strategies using JWT, OAuth2, and role-based access control across distributed systems.
Led production AI and LLM initiatives, including model inference pipelines, prompt engineering, and secure API integration within both .NET and Python services.
Established automated testing and TDD practices across the stack using xUnit, NUnit, MSTest, PyTest, Jest, and Cypress to improve reliability and release confidence.
Deployed and operated cloud-native systems on Azure and AWS, leveraging App Services, Functions, ECS/EKS, managed databases, and observability pipelines.
Designed and maintained CI/CD pipelines with Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions, enabling multi-environment releases and zero-downtime deployments.
Drove performance and reliability improvements through caching strategies, backend profiling, and frontend bundle optimization under real-world production traffic.

experience.title: Senior Engineer
bullets: Built and enhanced full-stack applications using .NET Core, React, and Node.js, contributing to both backend services and modern, component-based frontend interfaces.
Designed and optimized relational and non-relational data models using PostgreSQL, T-SQL, and MongoDB, supporting transactional workflows and analytics use cases.
Developed and consumed RESTful APIs, integrating frontend and backend systems with a focus on performance, reliability, and maintainable architecture.
Implemented unit and integration testing across backend and frontend layers using appropriate testing frameworks, improving release confidence and reducing regression issues.
Assisted with data processing and automation tasks using Python, supporting internal tooling and lightweight backend workflows.

experience.title: Software Engineer
bullets: Developed and maintained enterprise-grade education management systems using C# .NET and VB.NET, applying solid OOP principles to improve code maintainability, reusability, and long-term scalability.
Built and optimized SQL Server databases and complex T-SQL queries, stored procedures, and indexes to support high-volume student, financial, and administrative data processing.
Contributed to mobile application development using Apache Cordova and Ionic, delivering cross-platform mobile solutions used by school administrators and educators.
Implemented dynamic, responsive user interfaces with Angular, HTML, CSS, improving usability and consistency across desktop and mobile platforms.
Participated in full SDLC activities, including requirements analysis, system design, development, testing, deployment, and post-release support in a regulated education environment.
Collaborated closely with product managers, QA engineers, and business analysts to translate district-level requirements into reliable technical solutions.
Diagnosed and resolved production issues, performance bottlenecks, and data inconsistencies, improving system stability and reducing support turnaround time.

education.degree: Bachelor’s degree in Computer and Information Science
